attributes.action: Cheaper school dinners if child use public transport to school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be a good idea if children who use public transport to school to have cheaper school dinners with proof of the transport ie bus pass or bus ticket or travel by train this would help with the costs for the familys and not just familys on benefits than the school roads would be a bit safer when the children are coming out of school

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
